CreationTime.description: Date and time when the vector index was created.
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
Date and time when the vector index was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DataType.description: The data type of the vectors to be inserted into the vector index.
DataType.markdownDescription:
The data type of the vectors to be inserted into the vector index.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: float32  
Update requires: No interruption

Dimension.description: The dimensions of the vectors to be inserted into the vector index.
Dimension.markdownDescription:
The dimensions of the vectors to be inserted into the vector index.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

DistanceMetric.description: The distance metric to be used for similarity search.
DistanceMetric.markdownDescription:
The distance metric to be used for similarity search.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: cosine | euclidean  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.description: The encryption configuration for the index.

SseType.description: Defines the server-side encryption type for index encryption configuration. Defaults to the parent vector bucket's encryption settings when unspecified.
SseType.markdownDescription:
Defines the server-side encryption type for index encryption configuration. Defaults to the parent vector bucket's encryption settings when unspecified.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AES256 | aws:kms  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.description: AWS Key Management Service (KMS) customer managed key ID to use for the encryption configuration. This parameter is allowed if and only if sseType is set to aws:kms
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
AWS Key Management Service (KMS) customer managed key ID to use for the encryption configuration. This parameter is allowed if and only if sseType is set to aws:kms

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:kms:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:key/.+)$  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The encryption configuration for the index.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: No interruption

MetadataConfiguration.description: The metadata configuration for the vector index.

NonFilterableMetadataKeys.description: Non-filterable metadata keys allow you to enrich vectors with additional context during storage and retrieval. Unlike default metadata keys, these keys cannot be used as query filters. Non-filterable metadata keys can be retrieved but cannot be searched, queried, or filtered. You can access non-filterable metadata keys of your vectors after finding the vectors.

NonFilterableMetadataKeys.markdownDescription:
Non-filterable metadata keys allow you to enrich vectors with additional context during storage and retrieval. Unlike default metadata keys, these keys cannot be used as query filters. Non-filterable metadata keys can be retrieved but cannot be searched, queried, or filtered. You can access non-filterable metadata keys of your vectors after finding the vectors.
